sentences.en: Cold tea is very soothing for burns.
sentences.cn: 凉的茶水非常有助于减轻烧伤灼痛。

sentences.en: Conceive the soothing delight of that smile to her!
sentences.cn: 想想看,这种微笑对她来说,是多么能够给人安慰的快乐啊!

sentences.en: Cucumber is good for soothing tired eyes.
sentences.cn: 黄瓜有助于舒缓眼部疲劳。

sentences.en: He bought a greatcoat for himself of soothing proportions.
sentences.cn: 他给自己买了一件尺码肥大舒适的大衣.

sentences.en: He offered soothing words about the value of the French model in the recession and its ability to protect the most vulnerable from poverty.
sentences.cn: 对于衰退中法兰西模式的价值，以及保护绝大多数易受伤害的贫困人口的能力，他给予了安慰。
她的触摸令人感到很宽心.

sentences.en: His casual, relaxed manner was very soothing.
sentences.cn: 他随意而放松的举动让人很快便平静下来。

sentences.en: His soothing words subdued her fears.
sentences.cn: 他的安慰话减轻了她的恐惧.

sentences.en: His voice was deep and mellow and his speech had a soothing and comforting quality.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音低沉悦耳，他的讲话能抚慰人心。

sentences.en: It is likely to have a soothing effect on him.
sentences.cn: 这样很可能对他产生一种镇定的效用.

sentences.en: No one else leant over her, and whispered soothing words to her, or was near enough to hear the flutter of her beating heart.
sentences.cn: 没有其他任何人向她弯下身去，低声地对她说些安慰的话，或跟她挨得很近，可以听到她颤动的心房正在怦怦地跳动。

sentences.en: Put on some nice soothing music.
sentences.cn: 播放一些柔和舒缓的音乐。

sentences.en: Rhett's voice was interested and soothing and Bonnie's sobs died away.
sentences.cn: "瑞德的声音认真而亲切,邦妮听着听着就不抽泣了.

sentences.en: The monotone in which he spoke was strangely soothing.
sentences.cn: 他说话的调子毫无抑扬顿挫,却有一种奇妙的镇静作用.

sentences.en: The soothing, cooling effect is caused by the evaporation of the sweat on the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种放松而又凉爽的感觉是由于皮肤表面汗液的蒸发而产生的。

sentences.en: There was a soothing sincerity in the voice of Deerslayer.
sentences.cn: 杀鹿人说得真诚垦切,带着安慰口吻.

sentences.en: They had dressed his varicose ulcer with soothing ointment.
sentences.cn: 他们在静脉曲张的疮口上抹了清凉的油膏.

words.tran_cn: 安慰；减轻痛苦（soothe的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 慰藉的，使人宽心的，镇静的
安慰( soothe的现在分词 )，抚慰，使舒服，减轻痛苦
